basics.name: Egor Lyfar
basics.label: Technical Product Manager
basics.summary: Technical Product Manager. I lead discovery, roadmaps, and delivery; turn ambiguity into outcomes; prototype quickly with AI-assisted development; and partner with engineers on deeper systems. Energetic, clear, collaborative-with just enough humor to keep momentum.

work.name: ZFX
work.summary: Led product development for trading applications in a fast-paced FinTech environment; shipped user-centric features and platform improvements across web and mobile.
highlights: Shipped a modular PWA roadmap (onboarding, KYC, deposits, trading core, news/localization).
Grew app usage: +30% downloads, +25% active users; features lifted trading volume ~10%.
Overhauled KYC, recovering ~US$200k and cutting customer support workload ~30%.
Relaunched website: +25% traffic, +20% engagement; onboarding revamp reduced tickets ~20%.

work.name: Cointelegraph
work.summary: Part-time consulting on product strategy and roadmap for a leading blockchain media platform.
highlights: Co-created forward product roadmap with CTO and owner.
Led competitor/trend analysis to shape differentiation and sequencing.
Ran product audit using user/stakeholder input to realign KPIs and direction.

work.name: Sweet Fashion House Ltd.
work.position: Business Development Director / Technical Product Manager
work.summary: Led IT, web, and product initiatives while driving eCommerce growth and business development.
highlights: Saved ~HK$2,000,000 via in-house tech and process optimization.
Managed 600+ SKUs; rolled out tooling that improved retail operations and UX.

work.name: Neo Yachting S.A.S
work.position: Marketing and Digital Specialist, Technical Product Manager
work.summary: Owned digital strategy and business development; created revenue-driving web properties and marketing programs.
highlights: New UX/SEO site generated >EUR 5,000,000 in additional revenue.
Prototyped a yacht exchange model and supporting web flows.
Optimized VAT processes, adding ~EUR 40,000 in revenue.

references.name: Tatiana Delannoy
references.reference: Head of Marketing, Chanel - Egor has solid project management skills. He is professional, reliable, and aims at delivering a perfect product for his client. He is creative and a good listener, he has a strong eye for detail and makes relevant suggestions to elevate further the project.

references.name: Paul Flannery
references.reference: Executive Director, IYBA - Egor is a hard-working gentleman with superior talent in his interpersonal skills and technological knowledge. He has a rare creative ability, and in my experience, he will rise to any challenge presented to him. His serious work ethic, combined with his ability to communicate fluently in Russian, French, or English, positions him as a very valuable asset to any company.

references.name: Nicolas Valin
references.reference: Director, Neo Yachting - I have been working with Egor since 2011 and have been consistently impressed with Egor's attitude and productivity. He successfully transitioned from marketing executive to yacht charter broker and continued as an independent contractor, helping us with web development, photo and video content, event management and social media strategy.
